name: Karma is a Witch
description:
Defeat the evil witch by solving three enigmas in a wide black and white land, one loop at a time.

Movements: WASD/Arrows (+ mouse for selection)

Fullscreen is highly recommended!

This game is a Black and White #8 Jam submission. And yes, the main character is a tribute lol

Credits:

Music: https://www.fesliyanstudios.com/royalty-free-music/download/a-bit-of-hope/565

Tile set: https://bigindie.itch.io/16x16-1-bit-rpg-forest-tile-set
